name: Zesty Ziti
author: Donna Menz

ingredients.name: lb. Italian sausage, cut into 1/2 inch pieces
Hot cooked ziti or shell macaroni

instructions: In 2 quart saucepan, over medium heat, cook sausage, onion, and green pepper with garlic until sausage is done and vegetables are ten- der. Spoon off fat. Add spaghetti sauce. Heat thoroughly, stirring occasionally. Pour over ziti and mix.
